term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - carbon dioxide laser (CO2 laser)
term.title: carbon dioxide laser

item.text: A continuous or pulsed source of coherent radiation normally tunable through the CO2 vibration–rotation band centred near 10.6 µm.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2233 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
